title: Tidy ICD-10-CM Tools
text: basic example shows solve common problem:

title: Add ICD-10-CM Chapter Labels — case_chapter_icd10
text: df <chr>data frame col <sym> unquoted column name ICD-10-CM codes match

title: Add ICD-10-CM Chapter Labels — case_chapter_icd10
code: dplyr::tibble(code = c(               "F50.8", "G40.311", "Q96.8", "Z62.890", "R45.4",               "E06.3", "H00.019", "D50.1", "C4A.70", "Z20.818")) |>               case_chapter_icd10(code) #> # A tibble: 10 × 2 #>    code    chapter                                                               #>    <chr>   <chr>                                                                 #>  1 F50.8   Mental, behavioral and neurodevelopmental disorders                   #>  2 G40.311 Diseases of the nervous system                                        #>  3 Q96.8   Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities  #>  4 Z62.890 Factors influencing health status and contact with health services    #>  5 R45.4   Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not e… #>  6 E06.3   Endocrine, nutritional and metabolic diseases                         #>  7 H00.019 Diseases of the eye and adnexa                                        #>  8 D50.1   Diseases of the blood and blood-forming organs and certain disorders… #>  9 C4A.70  Neoplasms                                                             #> 10 Z20.818 Factors influencing health status and contact with health services

what: National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api
title: National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api
text: icd10api() allows search National Library Medicine's ICD-10-CM API code associated term.

title: National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api
code: icd10api(   code = NULL,   term = NULL,   field = c("both", "code"),   limit = 500L,   ... )

title: National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api
National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api
text: code <chr> ICD-10-CM code term <chr> Associated term describing ICD-10 code field <chr> code ; default limit <int> API limit, defaults 500 ... Empty

title: National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api

text: ICD-10-CM (International Classification Diseases, 10th Revision, Clinical Modification) medical coding system classifying diagnoses reasons visits U.S. health care settings.

title: National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api
text: NIH NLM Clinical Table Service ICD-10-CM API Learn ICD-10-CM.

title: National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api
National Library of Medicine's ICD-10-CM API — icd10api
code: # Returns the seven codes # beginning with "A15" icd10api(code = "A15") #> # A tibble: 7 × 2 #>   code  description                                  #>   <chr> <chr>                                        #> 1 A15.0 Tuberculosis of lung                         #> 2 A15.4 Tuberculosis of intrathoracic lymph nodes    #> 3 A15.5 Tuberculosis of larynx, trachea and bronchus #> 4 A15.6 Tuberculous pleurisy                         #> 5 A15.7 Primary respiratory tuberculosis             #> 6 A15.8 Other respiratory tuberculosis               #> 7 A15.9 Respiratory tuberculosis unspecified          # Returns the first five codes # associated with tuberculosis icd10api(term = "tuber", limit = 5) #> # A tibble: 5 × 2 #>   code  description                                  #>   <chr> <chr>                                        #> 1 A15.0 Tuberculosis of lung                         #> 2 A15.4 Tuberculosis of intrathoracic lymph nodes    #> 3 A15.5 Tuberculosis of larynx, trachea and bronchus #> 4 A15.6 Tuberculous pleurisy                         #> 5 A15.7 Primary respiratory tuberculosis              # Returns the two codes # associated with pleurisy icd10api(term = "pleurisy") #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   code  description          #>   <chr> <chr>                #> 1 R09.1 Pleurisy             #> 2 A15.6 Tuberculous pleurisy  # If you're searching for codes beginning # with a certain letter, you must set the # `field` param to `"code"` or it will # search for terms as well:  # Returns terms containing the letter "Z" icd10api(code = "z", limit = 5) #> # A tibble: 5 × 2 #>   code  description                                                           #>   <chr> <chr>                                                                 #> 1 A28.8 Other specified zoonotic bacterial diseases, not elsewhere classified #> 2 A28.9 Zoonotic bacterial disease, unspecified                               #> 3 A92.5 Zika virus disease                                                    #> 4 B02.0 Zoster encephalitis                                                   #> 5 B02.1 Zoster meningitis                                                      # Returns codes beginning with "Z" icd10api(code = "z", field = "code", limit = 5) #> # A tibble: 5 × 2 #>   code    description                                                            #>   <chr>   <chr>                                                                  #> 1 Z00.00  Encounter for general adult medical examination without abnormal find… #> 2 Z00.01  Encounter for general adult medical examination with abnormal findings #> 3 Z00.110 Health examination for newborn under 8 days old                        #> 4 Z00.111 Health examination for newborn 8 to 28 days old                        #> 5 Z00.121 Encounter for routine child health examination with abnormal findings
